title: Why do they call it a soft landing?
itunes:title: Why do they call it a soft landing?
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: The Federal Reserve is all but guaranteed to raise interest rates this week. We’ll spend some time on today’s show talking about “soft landings,” and why hard landings are more common. Plus: Puerto Rico’s grid, the school band economy and retail shrinkage.
itunes:summary: The Federal Reserve is all but guaranteed to raise interest rates this week. We’ll spend some time on today’s show talking about “soft landings,” and why hard landings are more common. Plus: Puerto Rico’s grid, the school band economy and retail shrinkage.
